title: Ademir Lemos - 1971 - Le Bateau Ao Vivo (funk soul collection, v
description:
poeiradiscos.blogspot.com proudly presents...


ADEMIR LEMOS - Le Bateau ao vivo (1970)
---------------------------------------

Together with Big Boy, Ademir was one of Brazil&#039;s first and top funk DJs in the 70&#039;s. First "found" by Carlos Imperial in his radio show "Clube dos BrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â´tos", at RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡dio Nacional, Ademir soon found work as a top dj and selecter, and ended up in the famous carioca club "Le Bateau" by the end of the 1960s and early 1970s. This is a collection organized by him and released by brazilian label Top Tape back in 1971.

Blogger and collector Merlinus, from http://merlinusesamantha.blogspot.com/, ripped this from his own vinyl copy. Cheers and credits go to him.

Torrented and freed from rapidshare hell by yours truly. Go to poeiradiscos.blogspot.com for mor information and other releases.



Tracking List:

01) Joey Levine - Come On My Baby
02) Rocky Candy Mt. - Sweet Magic
03) Joe Jeffrey - My Baby Loves Lovin`
04) Ronnie Milsap - What&#039;s Your Game
05) Mr. Bloe, Wind - Groovin&#039; With Mr. Bloe
06) Paul Flagg - Tell The Truth
07) Charles Hodges - Slip Around
08) George Tindley - Wan-Tu-Wah-Zuree
09) Don Young - Movin&#039;
10) No Second Thoughts - Top Shelf (About Who You Really Love)
11) Fragile Rock Valley - Be My Baby
12) Kool and The Gang - Kool and The Gang
